column2: A Caped Crusader from a distant planet, now fights for Truth and Justice.
As a superbeing, you can crush the enemy like an ant.
Look! Up in the sky, it's a bird, it's a plane...It's Superman!
As a God among insects, your will is law. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to declare war. You can call an end to it.
I will not interfere with these creatures.
The Man of Steel has heard of your invasion and commands you to end the violence.
I must bow before a God.
You are in battle and can destroy the enemy forces.
Your child has just been born and shows signs of great strength.
